alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 2:45PM CST until January 05 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON THURSDAY TO NOON CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow and freezing drizzle expected. Freezing drizzle will leave a light glaze on surfaces. * WHERE...In Kansas, Phillips and Rooks Counties. In Nebraska, Furnas and Harlan Counties. * WHEN...From noon Thursday to noon CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening and Friday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
